solution_line_template: The first day he saw {oysters_day1} oysters + {crabs_day1} crabs = <<{oysters_day1}+{crabs_day1}={animals_day1}>>{animals_day1} animals.
On the second day, he saw {oysters_fraction_day2} * {oysters_day1} oysters = <<{oysters_fraction_day2}*{oysters_day1}={oysters_day2}>>{oysters_day2} oysters.
The number of crabs by the beach on the second day was {crabs_fraction_day2} * {crabs_day1} crabs = <<{crabs_fraction_day2}*{crabs_day1}={crabs_day2}>>{crabs_day2}
He saw {crabs_day2} crabs + {oysters_day2} oysters = <<{crabs_day2}+{oysters_day2}={animals_day2}>>{animals_day2} animals on the second day.
The total for the two days is {animals_day2} animals + {animals_day1} animals = <<{animals_day2}+{animals_day1}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} animals
